text: Grégory Berthier (born 11 November 1995) is a French professional footballer who plays as a winger for Danish 1st Division club Vendsyssel FF. ==Club career== Berthier made his professional debut with AJ Auxerre in August 2014, in a 1–0 Ligue 2 defeat against Dijon. In June 2015, it was announced Berthier would join Stade de Reims for the 2015–16 having signed a four-year contract. He helped Stade de Reims win the 2017–18 Ligue 2, helping promote them to the Ligue 1 for the 2018–19 season. On 6 October 2020 it was confirmed, that Berthier had joined Danish 1st Division club Vendsyssel FF.VENDSYSSEL FF HENTER TO OFFENSIVE FORSTÆRKNINGER, vendsysselff.dk, 6 October 2020 ==Honours== Reims * Ligue 2: 2017–18 ==References== ==External links== * * * Grégory Berthier foot-national.com Profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Association football wingers Category:French footballers Category:French expatriate footballers Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:AJ Auxerre players Category:Stade de Reims players Category:Red Star F.C. players Category:Vendsyssel FF players Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark
title: Grégory Berthier
